current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To authorize the Secretary of the Air Force to modernize C–130 aircraft using alternative
			 communication, navigation, surveillance, and air traffic management
			 program kits and to ensure that such aircraft meet applicable regulations
			 of the Federal Aviation Administration.
